name: Guizhou Pengjiawan Coal Mine

verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. Source: https://www.gem.wiki/%E7%BB%86%E9%87%91%E5%8E%BF%E5%BD%AD%E5%AE%B6%E6%B9%BE%E7%85%A4%E7%9F%BF. The Guizhou Pengjiawan Coal Mine is located in the Yina Town of Zhi Jin County, Bijie City, Guizhou Province
